title: Powerhouse
description: Once upon a time, a midlife crisis was a personal thing. These days it can lead to fires, floods, earthquakes, or plagues. For the unlucky few, midlife means starting over with a new body, new abilities, and new responsibilities. Power not only corrupts, it disrupts lives forever. Colonel Marcia Galloway leads Mercury Battalion, a military unit that offers sanctuary to societyâ€™s deadliest members. When a slip in concentration can level buildings or kill hundreds, survival depends on self-control. Mercury trains its lethal recruits to become disciplined warriors. Her job is a challenge on the best of days. This day is anything but good.
author: K.M. Herkes
